TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi ProjectCollection extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 此类封装一组相关项目及其工具集、默认的全局属性集以及生成这些项目应使用的记录器。

span.span: This class encapsulates a set of related projects, their toolsets, a default set of global properties, and the loggers that should be used to build them.

summary.span: 此类的一个全局版本将用作默认的 ProjectCollection。

span.span: A global version of this class acts as the default ProjectCollection.

summary.span: appdomain 中可以有多个 ProjectCollection。

span.span: Multiple ProjectCollections can exist within an appdomain.

summary.span: 但是，它们不能同时生成。

span.span: However, these must not build concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序域中可以有多个项目集合。Multiple project collections can exist within an app domain. 但是，它们不能同时生成。However, these must not build concurrently.

summary.span: 创建一个没有全局属性或记录器的项目集合。

span.span: Creates a project collection with no global properties or loggers.

summary.span: 将利用配置文件和注册表初始化项目集合工具集。

span.span: The project collection toolset is initialized from the configuration file and registry.

span.span: Instantiates a project collection with no global properties or loggers that reads toolset information from the configuration file and registry.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultToolsVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultToolsVersion : string with get, set

summary.span: 此项目集合的默认工具版本。

span.span: The default tools version of this project collection.

summary.span: 如果项目未以其他方式告知要使用的工具版本，则这些项目将使用此工具版本。

span.span: Projects use this tools version if they aren't otherwise told what tools version to use.

summary.span: 这个值是从 .exe.config 文件或注册表中获得的，或者，如果没有指定默认工具版本，则会将其硬编码到工具版本“2.0”。

span.span: This value is gotten from the .exe.config file, or else in the registry, or if neither specify a default tools version then it is hard-coded to the tools version "2.0".

summary.span: 如果尚未定义具有提供的工具版本的工具集，则资源库会引发 InvalidOperationException。

span.span: Setter throws InvalidOperationException if a toolset with the provided tools version has not been defined.

summary.span: 始终定义。

span.span: Always defined.

value.span: 始终定义的此项目集合的默认工具版本。

span.span: The default tools version of this project collection, which is always defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此默认值是从从系统注册表中获取的 .exe.config 文件获取的，如果两者都不存在，则从硬编码工具版本 "2.0"。This default value is obtained from the .exe.config file, from the system registry, or if neither is present, from the hard-coded tools version "2.0". 如果尚未定义具有提供的工具版本的工具集，则 set 方法会引发 InvalidOperationException。The set method throws InvalidOperationException if a toolset with the provided tools version has not been defined.

summary.span: 此集合中的项目是否暂时禁用 MarkDirty()。

span.span: Whether MarkDirty() is temporarily disabled on projects in this collection.

summary.span: 例如，可以通过此标记来设置全局属性，而不必将项目标记为已更新（从而导致重新计算）。

span.span: This allows, for example, global properties to be set without projects getting marked dirty for reevaluation as a consequence.

value.span: 返回一个标志，该标志确定是否临时禁用 。

span.span: Returns a flag that determines whether is temporarily disabled.

summary.span: 获取适合向用户显示的引擎版本。

span.span: Gets a version of the Engine suitable for display to a user.

remarks.span: 这是 SemVer v2 版本的形式，即 "主修补程序-预发行版 + 元数据"。

span.span: This is in the form of a SemVer v2 version, Major.Minor.Patch-prerelease+metadata.

summary.span: 释放托管资源和非托管资源。

span.span: Releases both managed and unmanaged resources.

span.span: Called when a host no longer needs the project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 当主机完全完成项目集合时调用。

span.span: Called when a host is completely done with the project collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在随 .NET Framework 4.5 和 Visual Studio 12.0 一起提供的 MSBuild 版本中，必须在 ProjectCollection 超出范围之前调用 UnloadProject ( # A1。In the MSBuild versions that were delivered with .NET Framework 4.5 and Visual Studio 12.0, you must call UnloadProject() before the ProjectCollection goes out of scope."

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要同时释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 true；如果仅释放非托管资源，则为 false。

span.span: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources..

summary.span: 遵循标准框架准则释放模式。

span.span: Following standard framework guideline dispose pattern.

summary.span: 如果项目集合拥有日志服务，则关闭日志记录服务，以便关闭记录器线程和记录器。

span.span: Shut down logging service if the project collection owns one, in order to shut down the logger thread and loggers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 遵循 .NET 的垃圾处置指导原则。Follows the garbage disposal guidelines of .NET.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string Escape(string unescapedString) cil managed
Public Shared Function Escape (unescapedString As String) As String

span.span: The string to be converted.

summary.span: 使用 MSBuild 转义格式对字符串进行转义。

span.span: Escape a string using MSBuild escaping format.
For example, "%3b" for ";".

summary.span: 仅对对于 MSBuild 分析至关重要的字符进行转义。

span.span: Only characters that are especially significant to MSBuild parsing are escaped.

summary.span: 调用方可以使用此方法将字符串安全地分析为其他方法，以便这些方法以其他方式将其展开；或者将字符串安全写入项目文件。

span.span: Callers can use this method to make a string safe to be parsed to other methods that would otherwise expand it; or to make a string safe to be written to a project file.
The converted string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，“%3b”表示“;”。For example, "%3b" for ";". 仅转换特别适用于 MSBuild 分析的字符。Only characters that are especially significant to MSBuild parsing are converted. 调用方可以使用此方法来使字符串安全地由其他将其展开的方法进行分析。Callers can use this method to make a string safe to be parsed by other methods that would otherwise expand it. 调用方还可以使用此方法将字符串安全写入项目文件。Callers can also use this method to make a string safe to be written to a project file.

summary.span: 如果它们可由全局属性和/或工具版本区分，则可能有多个路径。

span.span: All projects whose project path matches the given path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能有多个具有给定路径的项目，因为项目也由全局属性和/或工具版本来区分。There may be more than one project with the given path because projects are also distinguished by global properties and/or tools version.

span.span: This is the default value used by newly created projects for whether or not the building of projects is enabled.

summary.span: 这是为了安全起见，主机需要严格控制允许哪些项目运行目标/任务。

span.span: This is for security purposes in case a host wants to closely control which projects it allows to run targets/tasks.

span.span: if the targets and tasks of projects in this project collection can be built; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于安全目的。Can be used for security purposes. 默认情况下，新项目具有与包含它的父项目集合相同的 IsBuildEnabled 设置。By default, a new project has the same IsBuildEnabled setting as the parent project collection that contains it. 当 IsBuildEnabled 为 false 时，此项目上的生成方法将失败。When IsBuildEnabled is false, the Build method on this project fails.

span.span: Unescape a string using MSBuild escaping format.
For example, "%3b" for ";".

summary.span: 所有转义字符均为非转义字符。

span.span: All escaped characters are unescaped.
The converted string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例如，将 "% 3b" 转换为 ";"。For example, "%3b" is converted to ";".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadAllProjects() cil managed

summary.span: 卸载此 ProjectCollection 包含的所有项目。

span.span: Unloads all the projects contained by this ProjectCollection.

summary.span: 当主机完全完成所有项目时，主机应调用此命令。

span.span: Host should call this when they are completely done with all the projects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当宿主不再需要项目时，应调用此方法。The host should call this method when it no longer needs the projects.

summary.span: 从项目根缓存中移除项目根元素。

span.span: Removes a project root element from the project root cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadProject(class Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectRootElement projectRootElement) cil managed

param.name: projectRootElement
param.span: 要卸载的项目 XML 根元素。

span.span: The project XML root element to unload.

summary.span: 卸载弱缓存中的项目 XML 根元素。

span.span: Unloads a project XML root element from the weak cache.

remarks.span: 此方法对于以下情况非常有用：主机知道使用此 XML 元素的所有项目都已卸载，并且需要放弃任何未保存的更改。

span.span: This method is useful for the case where the host knows that all projects using this XML element are unloaded, and desires to discard any unsaved changes.

exception.span: 如果加载的项目或其导入内容仍在使用要卸载的项目 XML 根元素，则引发此异常。

span.span: Thrown if the project XML root element to unload is still in use by a loaded project or its imports.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnloadProject(class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.Project project) cil managed

span.span: The project to remove.

summary.span: 卸载指定的特定项目。

span.span: Unloads the specific project specified.

summary.span: 当主机完全完成项目时，主机应调用此命令。

span.span: Host should call this when they are completely done with the project.

summary.span: 如果尚未加载项目，则会引发 InvalidOperationException。

span.span: If project was not already loaded, throws InvalidOperationException.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当主机不再需要该项目时，应调用此方法。The host should call this method when it no longer needs the project. 如果给定项目在项目集合中不存在，则会引发 InvalidOperationException。Throws InvalidOperationException if the given project is not present in the project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void UnregisterAllLoggers() cil managed

summary.span: 移除由此集合中的项目生成使用的记录器集合中的所有记录器。

span.span: Removes all loggers from the collection of loggers used for builds of projects in this collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Version As Version
public: static property Version ^ Version { Version ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取引擎程序集所在文件的文件版本。

span.span: Gets the file version of the file in which the Engine assembly lies.

value.span: 包含 MSBuild 引擎的程序集文件的文件版本。

span.span: The file version of the assembly file that contains the MSBuild engine.

remarks.span: 这是 Windows 文件版本 (专门) FileVersion 资源的值，而不一定是程序集版本。

span.span: This is the Windows file version (specifically the value of the FileVersion resource), not necessarily the assembly version.

remarks.span: 如果需要程序集版本，请使用 AssemblyVersion。

span.span: If you want the assembly version, use Constants.AssemblyVersion.
This is not the ToolsetCollectionVersion.
